articles.content:
Floral basket placed before Kim Il Sung's statue 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Indonesian ambassador to Korea Buchari Effendi and embassy officials  visited the statue of the President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Friday on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Indonesia.   They laid a floral basket before the statue and paid homage to him.

articles.content:
Songs distributed in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Tapes of "Song of General Kim Il Sung" have been widely distributed in the area of Songnam, South Korea, Seoul-based radio Voice of National Salvation quoted the Kyonggi provincial committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (Hanminjon) as saying.   Packed together with tapes manufactured in the name of the sun's society are the words and music of the song and an introductory article.   The introductory article says that April 15 is historical Sun's Day when President Kim Il Sung, the eternal sun and peerless patriot of the Korean nation, was born.   It called for making a deep bow to the president  in the eternal memory of him and commemorating Sun's Day for all ages, singing the "Song of General Kim Il Sung."

S. Korea's scheme to set up new military machine
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities scheme to set up a new military machine "planning team for military renovation," according to a news report.   They decided to place the planned organisation under the existing "steering committee of defence reform" in order to "implement military renovation proposals" and "cope with changes in war aspects."   The team is expected to have 40 to 50 war experts selected from the three services of the army and "institute of defense sciences."

articles.title: Reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung published

articles.content:
Reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung published
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) --  Part 1 the anti-Japanese revolution vol.3 of "With the Century", the reminiscences of the President Kim Il Sung, was published on April 14 by the all India Indo-Korean  Friendship Association on the occasion of Sun's Day.   The book in its preface says that the world progressive people are now joining the Korean people in significantly commemorating Sun's Day, the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung, with the highest tribute to him.    It notes the association is honored to publish Kim Il Sung's reminiscences volume 3 in Hindi.

articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from the national executive committee of the Worker's Party of Mexico and the visiting delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party.   Maria Guadeloupe Rodriguez, member of the national executive committee of the Worker's Party of Mexico who is leading the party delegation on a visit to Korea, conveyed the gift to Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the central committee of the Worker's Party of Korea, while  M. Dalaikhuu, head of the political department of the leadership council of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party who is leading its delegation  handed the gift to an official concerned.

Delegation of world council of churches arrives
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the world council of churches headed by its general secretary Konrad Raiser arrived here today.It was met by chairman Kang Yong Sop of the central committee of the Korean Christian Federation at the airport.
